mapper.select: select d.*, u.user_nickname from daily_board d left join user u on d.user_num = u.user_num order by d.daily_idx desc
select d.*, u.user_nickname from daily_board d left join user u on d.user_num = u.user_num where d.daily_idx = #{daily_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into daily_board (daily_title, daily_contents, daily_img, user_num) values (#{daily_title}, #{daily_contents}, #{daily_img}, #{user_num})
mapper.update: update daily_board set daily_title = #{daily_title}, daily_contents = #{daily_contents}, daily_img = #{daily_img}, daily_date = current_timestamp where daily_idx = #{daily_idx}
